spanish_language.title: Ejercicio 2: frutas
spanish_language.description_game: En este ejercicio seguiremos la misma idea que en el caso anterior, salvo que ahora intentaremos colocar 5 frutas distintas. ¡Vamos allá!

english_language.title: Exercise 2: fruits
english_language.description_game: In this exercise we will continue wih the same idea as in the previous case, but now we will try to put 5 different fruits. Let's go!
